tgt_original: ariṣṭavṛddhidvitīyamāsānte tṛtīyamāsapraveśe tasminn eva patre dinadvayaṃ vahati |
tato dvitīye punaḥ saptāṣṭanavame ca māse yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catuṣpañcaṣaḍdināni vahanti |  tatas triṃśadmāsarāśer aparamāstrayaṃ jīvitasya gatam |
tataḥ saptāviṃśatimāsān gṛhītvā tṛtīyapatre saṃcarati |  daśapatreṣu daśasaṃkrāntibhir ahorātraṃ karoti |
saptāviṃśatimāsebhyo māsatrayam ūnaṃ bhavati |  evaṃ yathoktavidhinā tṛtīyarāśipatraṃ tyajati |  navapatreṣu saṃkramaṇaṃ karoti |
evaṃ daśadinam ekādaśadinaṃ dvādaśadinaṃ vahati |  caturthapatraṃ tyajati |
evaṃ trayodaśadinaṃ caturdaśadinaṃ |  tataḥ pañcamaṃ patraṃ tyajati |  saptapatreṣu saṃkrāntiṃ karoti |
tathā ṣoḍaśasaptadaśāṣṭādaśadināni trimāsaṃ yathākramaṃ vahati |  ṣaṣṭhapatraṃ tyajya ṣaṭpatreṣu saṃkrāntiṃ karoti |
caturthamāsānte pañcamamāsapraveśe dinatrayaṃ vahati |  evaṃ ṣaḍmāsair ariṣṭadināni trīṇi |
